name: Aggression
overview: Published in the book "Powerplays on the Commodore 64", Aggression is a political simulator. Watch the screen as nations build up their armies and declare war. Will the whole world go to war as rival ideologies collide or will peace and common sense prevail? Your computer becomes a test-tube of political power blocks - jealousy, greed, envy and mistrust - alliances and enemies - the far left versus the far right. Who will win? And why?
